briefDescription: Nikunj foundation undertake 1-activities in the field of education and imparting of knowlwdge knowlwdge including setting up schools , colleges , training centres , hostels and other related activities .2-organize literacy camp for slum childrens , beggers and differently abled childrens in the state of west bengal . 3-provide life skills to the children . 4-Integrated learning camps for children from well to do family and children from slums etc. 5-provide training to survive and support family and his / her education . 6-From our inception as organisation we served about hundreds of children.
